text: i O Q i ’BO ()¢ p Signs of heart failure + Cardiomegaly CTR = 18/30 (>50%) + Upper zone vessel enlargement (1) — a sign of pulmonary venous hypertension + Septal (Kerley B) lines (2) - a sign of interstitial oedema — see next picture + Airspace shadowing (3) — due to alveolar oedema — acutely in a peri-hilar (bat's wing) distribution + Blunt costophrenic angles (4) — due to pleural effusions
